title: Social: Making Plans (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Making Plans subcategory within Social. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Let's go to a concert together.
cards.japanese: 一緒にコンサートに行きましょう。

cards.english: We should go to the party together.
cards.romaji: Bokutachi issho ni pati ni iko yo.
cards.japanese: 僕たち一緒にパーティーに行こうよ。
